page.title: 06BROTHER ADAM
page.content: He took us to see the storage tanks. His friend,who was Irish came too, smoking his pipe. We went into the first room.As we went in and breathed, the smell of honey filled our noses and a murmur of{'M,m,m,'}went round. The floor was covered with hexagons like{honeycombs.}There were lots of machines in this room;special knives to clean the wax off the combs, a whizzing machine to get the honey out, a bottler which looked like a big lumpy microscope and could fill{1500 jars an hour.I thought it funny that the Irish man was still smoking his pipe when a sign said{"No Smoking" most defnitely. We then went upstairs to see the enormous storage tanks that{Brother Adam}had made himself and then to see his trophies and his {OBE} As we left he showed us the{500 yr old hives built into the original walls.
